Text: think about this, trump would rather declare martial law on millions of americans than to, RIGHTFULLY, arrest and charge 3 officers with murder. THIS is the country we live in. i will never forgive the people who put him in office.

I saw "Trump Resign" trending the other day. He's no quitter. He didn't create this mess, but i don't doubt his ability to help clean it up. He has our back and i have his.Do you? #Trump2020

The Trump regime declared Antifa a terrorist organisation and then declared all protestors Antifa; this is a move to legitimise killing civilians. Trump has defined the terms of engagement of the Civil War he is inciting, it is not Black vs White it is Fascist vs Antifascist.
It is shameful the UK Government won't condemn Trump.Now is the time to speak up for justice and equality.#BlackLivesMatter #JusticeForGeorgeFloyd

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.

The British government is delaying the publishing of the Covid-19 BAME death disparity report because of the George Floyd murder and the #BlackLivesMatterUK demonstrations. At the same time they're easing up the lockdown and exposing BAME ppl to Covid19.This is absurd.
